record.description: New version of Chicago Basketball. This picture is supposed to illustrate a story on the University of Chicago girls' intramural basketball. Just what part of the game this represents we're not sure but they're cute aren't they. First row, left to right, the girls are: Barbara Weiner, clutching the basketball, Nita Rose, Virginia Bennett, and Lurena Button; second row: Louise Harney and Shirley Roger.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Attached news clipping/caption. Paint on the surface.
